title: New: To The Wedding – Come On
body:
Another beautiful track from Lauren Grubb aka **To The Wedding**, lifted from her forthcoming extended EP, Silver Currents.

Ethereal in nature, centred around one of the most intoxicating guitar sounds of the year, _Come On_ is further indication that her new release is shaping up to be rather special. Part Beach House, part Slowdive, check out Come On below and pre-order the EP [here](https://tothewedding.bandcamp.com/album/silver-currents-preorder).
